1.0.1.name: wordpress/simple-coming-soon-and-under-construction
1.0.1.description:
Simple plugin provides easy setuping coming soon page by clicking on dropdown menu.

It offers you two site states: * Usual, running site * Coming soon page

Independent of selected state, logged administrators always see the full, running site. This is very useful for site maintance and fixing.

At the moment, there is one predefined theme, but you can create the custom one by creating coming-soon.php file into your active theme folder.

If you have any question(s) related to this plugin, ask me on http://mariokostelac.com and feel free to drop me a line on mario.kostelac[at]gmail.com
